title: Selling More: Optimizing For Conversations
description:
It's the most wonderful time of the year to initiate conversations with your network

Talking Points

  • How to revive dead deals
  • The best communication channel for making connections
  • Why outreach is both predictable and unpredictable
  • The importance of genuine curiosity
  • Networking for introverts

Related Links

  • Closing The Loop by Blair Enns
author: jstark@jonathanstark.com (Jonathan Stark and Rochelle Moulton)
